00025 #ifndef _DynLib_H__
00026 #define _DynLib_H__
00027 
00028 #include "OgrePrerequisites.h"
00029 
00030 #include "OgreResource.h"
00031 
00032 #if OGRE_PLATFORM == PLATFORM_WIN32
00033 #    define DYNLIB_HANDLE hInstance
00034 #    define DYNLIB_LOAD( a ) LoadLibrary( a )
00035 #    define DYNLIB_GETSYM( a, b ) GetProcAddress( a, b )
00036 #    define DYNLIB_UNLOAD( a ) !FreeLibrary( a )
00037 
00038 struct HINSTANCE__;
00039 typedef struct HINSTANCE__* hInstance;
00040 
00041 #elif OGRE_PLATFORM == PLATFORM_LINUX
00042 #    define DYNLIB_HANDLE void*
00043 #    define DYNLIB_LOAD( a ) dlopen( a, RTLD_NOW | RTLD_GLOBAL )
00044 #    define DYNLIB_GETSYM( a, b ) dlsym( a, b )
00045 #    define DYNLIB_UNLOAD( a ) dlclose( a )
00046 
00047 #endif
00048 
00049 namespace Ogre {
00050 
00062     class _OgreExport DynLib : public Resource
00063     {
00064     public:
00069         DynLib( const String& name );
00070 
00073         ~DynLib();
00074 
00079         virtual void load();
00084         virtual void unload();
00085 
00097         virtual void* getSymbol( const String& strName ) const throw();
00098 
00099     protected:
00100 
00102         DYNLIB_HANDLE m_hInst;
00103     };
00104 
00105 }
00106 
00107 #endif
